verses.text: \w Great|strong="H7227"\w* \w have|strong="H3478"\w* been \w my|strong="H0559"\w* troubles \w from|strong="H3478"\w* \w the|strong="H0559"\w* \w time|strong="H3478"\w* \w when|strong="H3478"\w* \w I|strong="H0559"\w* \w was|strong="H3478"\w* young (\w let|strong="H4994"\w* \w Israel|strong="H3478"\w* \w now|strong="H4994"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*);

\w Great|strong="H7227"\w* \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w been|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* troubles \w from|strong="H1571"\w* \w the|strong="H1571"\w* time \w when|strong="H1571"\w* \w I|strong="H3201"\w* \w was|strong="H1571"\w* young, \w but|strong="H3808"\w* \w my|strong="H3808"\w* troubles \w have|strong="H1571"\w* \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w overcome|strong="H3201"\w* \w me|strong="H3808"\w*.

\w The|strong="H5921"\w* ploughmen \w were|strong="H5921"\w* ploughing \w on|strong="H5921"\w* \w my|strong="H5921"\w* \w back|strong="H1354"\w*; \w long|strong="H0748"\w* \w were|strong="H5921"\w* \w the|strong="H5921"\w* wounds \w they|strong="H5921"\w* made.

\w The|strong="H3068"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w is|strong="H3068"\w* \w true|strong="H3068"\w*: \w the|strong="H3068"\w* \w cords|strong="H5688"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H3068"\w* evil-doers \w are|strong="H7563"\w* broken \w in|strong="H3068"\w* \w two|strong="H7112"\w*.

Let \w all|strong="H3605"\w* \w the|strong="H3605"\w* haters \w of|strong="H3605"\w* \w Zion|strong="H6726"\w* \w be|strong="H3605"\w* \w shamed|strong="H0954"\w* \w and|strong="H0954"\w* \w turned|strong="H5472"\w* \w back|strong="H0268"\w*.

\w Let|strong="H1961"\w* \w them|strong="H1961"\w* \w be|strong="H1961"\w* \w like|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* \w grass|strong="H2682"\w* \w on|strong="H1961"\w* \w the|strong="H1961"\w* house-tops, \w which|strong="H2682"\w* \w is|strong="H1961"\w* \w dry|strong="H3001"\w* \w before|strong="H6927"\w* \w it|strong="H1961"\w* \w comes|strong="H1961"\w* \w to|strong="H1961"\w* full growth.

\w He|strong="H3808"\w* \w who|strong="H3808"\w* gets \w in|strong="H3808"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* grain has \w no|strong="H3808"\w* use \w for|strong="H4390"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w*; \w and|strong="H3709"\w* \w they|strong="H3808"\w* do \w not|strong="H3808"\w* make bands \w of|strong="H3709"\w* \w it|strong="H3808"\w* \w for|strong="H4390"\w* \w the|strong="H4390"\w* grain-stems.

\w And|strong="H3068"\w* \w those|strong="H0853"\w* \w who|strong="H3068"\w* \w go|strong="H5674"\w* \w by|strong="H3068"\w* do \w not|strong="H3808"\w* \w say|strong="H0559"\w*, \w The|strong="H0853"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w* \w be|strong="H3808"\w* \w on|strong="H0413"\w* \w you|strong="H1288"\w*; we give \w you|strong="H1288"\w* \w blessing|strong="H1293"\w* \w in|strong="H0413"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w name|strong="H8034"\w* \w of|strong="H3068"\w* \w the|strong="H0853"\w* \w Lord|strong="H3068"\w*.
